channel.title: CVE Feed for Oceanic Software -- ValeApp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oceanic Software -- ValeApp

item.title: CVE-2024-8608|2024-09-27T12:00:27.699Z -- oceanic%20software -- valeapp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Oceanic Software ValeApp allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ValeApp: before v2.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-8609|2024-09-27T12:01:15.154Z -- oceanic%20software -- valeapp
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Oceanic Software ValeApp allows Query System for Information.This issue affects ValeApp: before v2.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-8607|2024-09-27T12:04:40.125Z -- oceanic%20software -- valeapp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Oceanic Software ValeApp allows SQL Injection.This issue affects ValeApp: before v2.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-8643|2024-09-27T12:00:51.229Z -- oceanic%20software -- valeapp
item.description: Session Fixation vulnerability in Oceanic Software ValeApp allows Brute Force, Session Hijacking.This issue affects ValeApp: before v2.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-8644|2024-09-27T11:50:56.790Z -- oceanic%20software -- valeapp
item.description: Cleartext Storage of Sensitive Information in a Cookie vulnerability in Oceanic Software ValeApp allows Protocol Manipulation, : JSON Hijacking (aka JavaScript Hijacking).This issue affects ValeApp: before v2.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-8643|2024-09-27T11:53:44.040Z -- oceanic%20software -- valeapp
item.description: Session Fixation vulnerability in Oceanic Software ValeApp allows Brute Force, Session Hijacking.This issue affects ValeApp: before v2.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-8609|2024-09-27T11:55:52.550Z -- oceanic%20software -- valeapp
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Oceanic Software ValeApp allows Query System for Information.This issue affects ValeApp: before v2.0.0.
